name: Create a Sales Lead Appointment with a noteText greater than 60 characters

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000933079696000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1

When I create a sales lead appointment for a customer with values:
| cifKey | contactStaffID | interestedInProduct | noteText | scheduleDate | appointmentStartTime | appointmentEndTime |
| 0100000933079696000 | 83018 | Regular Savings | This UI note pad is exactly sixty one characters all in total | next_week | 09.00 | 09.30 |

children.description: Create sales lead appointment: | cifKey | contactStaffID | interestedInProduct | noteText | scheduleDate | appointmentStartTime | appointmentEndTime | | 0100000933079696000 | 83018 | Regular Savings | This UI note pad is exactly sixty one characters all in total | next_week | 09.00 | 09.30 |

testSteps.description: Then I should receive a Validation Error
